data.name: To The Sea : The Courier
data.detailed_description:
Game Updata：

For more information on game updates, please visit the communityhttps://steamcommunity.com/app/665840/.

Gamemode:

This is a top-down RPG game. At present, there are three characters to choose from (two of which need to be unlocked through the game process). Players play the role of courier in the game.
In the story mode, players travel through the block world after the end to understand the status quo, collect the necessary survival materials and basic equipment, and explore the possibilities of the future.
In the skirmish mode, players can gain more game fun and more powerful equipment by playing Rougulike-like levels.
In addition, there will be defensive mode and blockchain mode in the future, but the current main focus will be on the development of the first two modes.

Story:

Our Universe Is Full Of Disorder and Madness,
Because of an accidental opportunity, Meow Meow bought Earth from the Universe Store,
When the day of the world broke, most humans don't know what happened ...
Once the continent and the ocean were divided into blocks by magic and cruelty,
Most of them are scattered among the different cat families.
The connection, the cutoff, and the subsequent consumption of resources cannot be replenished.
Make most creatures, especially those in big cities, disappear.
Despite the timely intervention of low-tech bio-protection organizations, to a certain extent, the survival of the remaining earth creatures has been guaranteed.
But the earth ... was gone.
Humans in desperate circumstances developed the technology of courier and selected some humans who can adapt to block transmission to train as a courier.
Bring minimal connections to different blocks.
However, with the passage of time, most of the blocks that still exist on the earth have been reduced to the playthings of the cubs.
A strange courier was awakened ...

data.short_description: After the world was forcibly cut into blocks by aliens and sold, human society has created a unique profession of courier, spanning space and fear, and delivering important information and materials.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: I3-2120
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I3-6100
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX760
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: Arch Linux
  • Processor: I3-2120
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
